attributes.action: Upgrade one of the busiest roads in the UK, the A17 to Dual Carriageway between Newark and Kings Lynn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The A17 is classified as a red route, it is an extrememly busy route which see's heavy traffic flow 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. I believe many accidents are due to frustration, the road is often clogged by lorries moving at 40 mph. It can take 2 and a half hours to move 60 miles, there is no area's to overtake and it is very frustrating. I firmly believe the road should be a dual carriageway!
